content.rendered:
On May 17,  the district held a retirement reception to celebrate the 2022-2023 retirees. Thank you for serving the students and families in our district!

Congratulation to the following staff members:

  • Rogann Beagle – Maple Avenue Middle School
  • Tony Devizzio – Saratoga Springs High School
  • Daniel DiBlasi – Maple Avenue Middle School
  • Karen Doane – Geyser Road Elementary School
  • James Ebert – Maple Avenue Middle School
  • Joni Ernst – Maple Avenue Middle School
  • Deborah Fitzgerald – Greenfield Elementary School
  • Julie Freebern – Maple Avenue Middle School
  • William Hollner – Transportation Department
  • Victoria Jones – Caroline Street Elementary School
  • Michele Kane – Saratoga Springs High School
  • Catherine Kleinfelder – Saratoga Springs High School
  • Milton Lee – Saratoga Springs High School
  • Frances Lohnes – Saratoga Springs High School
  • Elizabeth McMartin – Saratoga Springs High School
  • Carmina Miller – Saratoga Springs High School
  • Shirley Neander – Saratoga Springs High School
  • Joshua Nixon – Maple Avenue Middle School
  • Irene Ogden – Greenfield Elementary School
  • Elthea Sadlon – Saratoga Springs High School
  • Tina Senecal – Greenfield Elementary School
  • Wayne Stanton – Geyser Road Elementary School
  • Charles Tanzer – Transportation Department
  • Joseph Tardif – Caroline Street Elementary School
  • Dianne Tucker – Maple Avenue Middle School
  • Joanne Varney – Maple Avenue Middle School
  • Jeffery Wainwright  – Transportation Department
